1440/19 = 75.78947368	# idle

1440/28 = 51.42857143	# run


75.78947368 / 51.42857143 = 1.47368421


3/1.47368421 = 2.035714286 (Y multiplier)

2/1.47368421 = 1.357142857 (X multiplier)

________________________________________________


1440/28 = 51.42857143	# run

1440/23 = 62.6086956522	# jump


62.6086956522 / 51.42857143 = 1.21739130431

3/1.21739130431 = 2.46428571436 (Y multiplier)

2/1.21739130431 = 1.64285714291 (X multiplier)

________________________________________________


1440/28 = 51.42857143	# run

1440/27 = 53.3333333333 # fall


53.3333333333 / 51.42857143 = 1.03703703701

3/1.03703703701 = 2.89285714293 (Y multiplier)

2/1.03703703701 = 1.92857142862 (X multiplier)

________________________________________________

1440/28 = 51.42857143	# run

1440/25 = 57.6	# jumpToFall image 1

1440/27 = 53.3333333333	# jumpToFall image 2

53.3333333333 / 51.42857143 = 1.03703703701	# Image 1 divider

3/1.03703703701 = 2.89285714293 (Image 1 Y multiplier)

2/1.03703703701 = 1.92857142862 (Image 1 X multiplier)

53.3333333333 / 57.6 = 0.92592592592	# Image 2 divider

3/0.92592592592	= 3.24000000002 (Image 2 Y multiplier)

2/0.92592592592	= 2.16000000001 (Image 2 X multiplier)
